message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,400,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and potential.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the value of the product.
Bob, thanks for your counteroffer.  I understand your perspective on the value, but  $1,200,000 is below its true worth. I'm willing to come down slightly. How about $1,350,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $1,350,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $1,300,000?
